meanings.definition: A specimen designated as the type of a species when multiple specimens were originally designated as types.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, the syntypes of the new species were carefully preserved for research.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the syntypes to understand the characteristics of the species.
meanings.sent3: The syntypes decided to have a party to celebrate being the representatives of their species.
meanings.sent4: The syntypes stood out like shining stars among the other specimens in the collection.
meanings.sent5: The syntypes were like ambassadors, showcasing the unique features of their species.

meanings.definition: Specimens used in the original description of a species when no holotype was designated.
meanings.sent1: The syntypes displayed distinct traits that helped identify the new species.
meanings.sent2: Researchers referred to the syntypes to confirm the species' characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The syntypes joked that they were the 'cool kids' of the species description.
meanings.sent4: The syntypes played a crucial role in painting a clear picture of the new species.
meanings.sent5: The syntypes were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly to define the species.
